description: fol. 1b-36b. 208 x 153; 167 x 100 mm. 25 lin. cop. by the authorʼs grandson ʻAbd al-Raḥīm, Ramaḍān 1125. Followed on fol. 39a-114b by Majmūʻat laṭāʼif wa-tarājim wa-multaqatāt wa-muntakhabāt adabīyah. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 485 (no. 19); S II, 497. Incip.: ... قال ... الحمد لله ... وبعد فهذه مفاخر ىلذّ بمعانىها
author: Karmī, Marʻī ibn Yūsuf, -1623 or 1624
title: Qalāʼid al-ʻiqyān fī faḍāʼil āl ʻUthmān.
creator: Karmī, Marʻī ibn Yūsuf, -1623 or 1624
subject: Arabic literature—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
